name: ClearSol CHLOR HF
description: ClearSol CHLOR HF is a high-foaming surfactant system that is readily soluble in 12% active sodium hypochlorite (bleach) solutions as well as other oxidizers, including hydrogen peroxide. It has high foam properties, making ClearSol CHLOR HF suitable for many industrial cleaning processes where high foaming properties are desirable. ClearSol CHLOR HF contributes to quick dynamic surface tension lowering, resulting in fast wetting and spreading on various hydrophobic substrates.
